name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: No man enjoys the true taste of life, but he who is ready and willing to quit it.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: Life is very short and anxious for those who forget the past, neglect the present, and fear the future.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: It's not because things are difficult that we dare not venture. It's because we dare not venture that they are difficult.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: Nothing is so wretched or foolish as to anticipate misfortunes. What madness is it to be expecting evil before it comes.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: No state of slavery is more disgraceful than one which is self-imposed

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: Anger, if not restrained, is frequently more hurtful to us than the injury that provokes it.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: There are more things to alarm us than to harm us, and we suffer more often in apprehension than reality.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste a lot of it.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quote: If it is not right, do not do it, if it is not true, do not say it.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be One.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quote: It never ceases to amaze me: we all love ourselves more than other people, but care more about their opinion than our own.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Choose not to be harmed — and you won’t feel harmed. Don’t feel harmed — and you haven’t been.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Be tolerant with others and strict with yourself.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.

name: Epictetus
quote: How long are you going to wait before you demand the best for yourself?

name: Epictetus
quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.

name: Epictetus
quote: Curb your desire, don’t set your heart on so many things and you will get what you need.

name: Epictetus
quote: Don’t seek for everything to happen as you wish it would, but rather wish that everything happens as it actually will—then your life will flow well.

name: Epictetus
quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quote: if it's endurable then endure it. Stop complaining.

name: Bruce Lee
quote: Do not correct a fool or he weill hate you; correct a wise man, and he will appreciate you.

name: Epictetus
quote: Suffering arises from trying to control what is uncontrollable.

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: A man who suffers before it is necessary, suffers more than is necessary.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Remember that very little is needed to make a happy life.

name: Alexander Graham Bell
quote: The differece between success and failure is the ability to ake action.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quote: Never let the future disturb you.

name: Epictetus
quote: It is unrealistic to expect people to see you as you see yourself

name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity
